item.title: Workplace culture the hidden JD
item.description: I am that weird guy who asks random questions to strangers. I recently had the opporunity to talk with a Japenese medium size business owner in a public transport. I always wanted to ask a question to a Japanese business owner, and I finally did. Me: I understand the idea of “Japanese humbleness,” but waht if I don’t want to clean the toilet and the surrounding area. He: Well, if all the employees are doing that, including the president, you should as well. Me: I understand that, but if I am hired as an accountant and people have already cleaned the toilet 3 times, what is the value in this?

item.title: Anyfactor - Developer first product/solutions dude
item.description: I am a DevRel at a data company. I am very happy with my full time job. …but I used to moonlight as a freelance Python developer specializing in product and feature development that focuses on data, automation and API development. You can find more info here: https://anyfactor.xyz I love to solve problems with programming. I enjoy programming and I am great at at explaining technical things in layperson terms. I spend my weekends mostly indiehacking or programming. I am open to Business + Programming ‘hybrid’ roles in super part time capacity. < 20 Hours / Week including weekends. ðŸ”— Portfolio Website: https://anyfactor.
